data.comment: The big names in today's match at Nabizao have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 2, Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Palmeiras's Ze Rafael gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bragantino defender.
In the minute 3, Bragantino are pushing forward but Edimar's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Claudinho of Bragantino gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 5, Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Nabizao.
Free kick Palmeiras.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Nabizao.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Palmeiras.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
In the minute 13, Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the home team a throw-in.
Bragantino's Artur breaks free at Nabizao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Palmeiras's Patrick de Paula gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 18, Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 21, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Wesley for Palmeiras drives towards goal at Nabizao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 22, Bragantino's Ricardo Ryller has been booked in Braganca Paulista.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a throw-in for Palmeiras, close to Bragantino's area.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
Bragantino needs to be cautious. Palmeiras have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 27, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Palmeiras drives forward and Patrick de Paula gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in Bragantino.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Palmeiras will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Bragantino.
At Nabizao, Gustavo Gomez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 31, Claudinho (Bragantino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Ze Rafael for Palmeiras gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the home team in Braganca Paulista.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Bragantino are coming forward and Artur gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 40, Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Bragantino throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Nabizao.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 44, Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Vitor Hugo (Palmeiras) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Bragantino throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
In the minute 45, Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Nabizao the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Patrick de Paula is back on the pitch.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Free kick in a good position for Bragantino!
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Nabizao.
Bruno Tubarao is replacing Leandrinho for Bragantino at Nabizao.
The match at Nabizao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Patrick de Paula, who is down injured.
The second half has started at Nabizao.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 47, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Palmeiras.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
In the minute 50, Palmeiras drive forward but Matias Vina is judged offside.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Felipe de Oliveira Conceicao (Bragantino) is making a second substitution, with Uillian Correia replacing Ricardo Ryller.
Claudinho scores to make it 1-0 at Nabizao.
Ytalo with an assist there.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Nabizao.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Bragantino.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Bragantino's Ytalo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Artur for the home team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Palmeiras.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Bragantino.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Alerrandro is replacing Ytalo for the home team.
Palmeiras make their first substitution with Gabriel Veron replacing Mayke.
The away team replace Wesley with Willian.
In the minute 67, Rony is on a sub for Ze Rafael for Palmeiras.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braganca Paulista.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, Goal! Palmeiras draw level to 1-1 through a Gabriel Veron header.
Great play from Gabriel Menino to set up the goal.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
In the minute 72, In Braganca Paulista Bragantino attack through Alerrandro. The finish is off target, however.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Bruno Tubarao of Bragantino gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Palmeiras at Nabizao.
Willian gets his shot on target but fails to score for Palmeiras.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Bragantino.
In the minute 80, The away team replace Patrick de Paula with Danilo Dos Santos De Oliveira.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 81, Artur (Bragantino) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Palmeiras.
In Braganca Paulista Bragantino drive forward through Artur. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the away team a throw-in.
Raphael Veiga is replacing Lucas Lima for the away team.
In the minute 84, Morato is on a sub for Claudinho for Bragantino.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Palmeiras just outside Bragantino's area.
In Braganca Paulista Palmeiras's Willian is caught offside.
In the minute 87, Leo Ortiz of Bragantino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Bragantino.
Palmeiras are coming forward and Luiz Adriano gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 88, Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Throw-in Bragantino.
Alerrandro (Bragantino) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
The fourth official's board shows 9 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Palmeiras push forward at Nabizao and Gabriel Menino gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bragantino defence.
Throw-in for Bragantino at Nabizao.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bragantino's Artur gets in a shot on goal at Nabizao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
Goal! Palmeiras have got their heads in front thanks to a Willian strike.
That's a fine assist from Gabriel Veron.
Vitor Hugo (Palmeiras) has received a yellow card from Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Danilo Dos Santos De Oliveira (Palmeiras) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Morato (Bragantino) sees red and is sent off in Braganca Paulista!
